documents.document: .@10Ronaldinho: â€œI always tried to be a good influence on Messi and actually tried to do for him what @Ronaldo did for me. I felt embraced by @Ronaldo and I wanted Leo to have the same. He was very shy, but always a fantastic player.â€ https://t.co/hQKk68V8eG
